typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		member_id as integer,
		loan_amnt as double,
		funded_amnt as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select a.id, b.member_id, c.loan_amnt, d.funded_amnt\n\nfrom loans a\n\nINNER JOIN loansdemo b ON b.id = a.id\n\nINNER JOIN loanspartition c on c.id = a.id\n\nINNER JOIN loansnopartition d on d.id = a.id',
	format: 'query',
	partitionColumn: 'id',
	partitionBy('external', 20)) ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
